div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1073 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1902 Burial: c. 300-275 B.C. Contents: 6 AE. In burial Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 17-18 [3], 21-22 [1], 25 [2]) Disposition: museum material lost during war Shkorpil, IAK g (1904), p. 175, no. 538
